pathfinding.​ XPS_PF_fnc_checkCoastTravel
_result = [_startPos, _endPos, _distanceThreshold*] call XPS_PF_fnc_checkCoastTravel
Description

Checks if there is any non-shallow water between two points based on a threshold.

Authors

Crashdome

Parameters
_startPos
Array

can be 2D or 3D point (ASL)

_endPos
Array

can be 2D or 3D point (ASL)

_distanceThreshold*
Number

[Optional - Default : 100] - distance of water in meters

Returns
_result
Boolean

True if water exists, otherwise False
